review: Almost no instructions on operation of the remote.  Particularly with apps.  I am using the Slingplayer app and there are absolutely no instructions on how to use the remote. Also app  needs improvement.
author: Robert Curran

review: Works great!  As an amazon prime member gives me the ability to listen to all of my Prime music and watch all my Prime TV/Movies.  With NetFlix I'm now on this TV more than the one with AppleTV.
author: L.A. Wigles "roadtrip"

review: This did not meet expectations.  It was difficult to set up (no instructions).  It is not simply plug in and use.  It has to be activated.  Which for some unknown reason it would not activate.  I had to use the extension for the stick and then it activated.  However, there is a separate charge to use every feature.  Nothing is included.  The biggest issue is the fact that when watching a movie or TV show the upload is constantly buffering.  I am returning the product.
author: Vince

review: Not as many channe ls as Roku yet but it will.  Easy setup I bought dirct from Amazon so was preprogramed with my info Some of the channels require you to pay a subscription fee which is in the pre sale ads. Some others were free only if you receive them on  cable or  satelite such as Hbo go or Showtime which I expected  Overall I like the firestick as I can take it with me where ever  i am and whatch what I normally  miss
author: Amazon Customer "joelpps"

review: Great product, functions perfectly. Good value compared to alternatives. Navigation is a little clunky. The iOS app leaves something to be desired. Maybe that aspect will improve over time.
author: Brad Hancock

review: This is a great device. Ours is not a real "tekkie" household, so this is just what we needed. Smart tv without having to go buy one.  We have prime and access to movies is great. Also no problem accessing my netflix account.  Love that it is portable. Can move from one TV to  next easily.
author: Judith L. Green

review: I have access to all the Amazon Prime content that is free which is nice. I also have access to Pandora, Tune In Radio, Showtime, Hulu, and much more. It was easy to install and very easy to use and I am not technically inclined by no means.
author: Nicole Stephens

review: It cannot work outside the US and this was not indicated earlier on in the description. So I wasted my money.
author: Blonchin

review: Love this! It downloads very quickly and is easy to use. The remote control makes it even more convenient.
